doc:
Darwin Joston https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darwin_Joston 0 Francis Darwin Solomon (December 9, 1937 – June 1, 1998) was an American actor known professionally as Darwin Joston (sometimes credited as Darwin Jostin during the early years of his career). Joston began his career as a New York stage actor, and he appeared in many popular television shows during the 1960s, early 1970s, and mid-1980s, but he is best known for his performances in independent films that later achieved cult status, particularly Assault on Precinct 13. Francis_Darwin_Solomon ( December_9_,_1937 – June_1_,_1998 ) was an_American_actor known professionally as Darwin_Joston ( sometimes_credited as Darwin_Jostin during the_early_years of his_career ) . Joston began his_career as a_New_York_stage_actor , and he appeared in many_popular_television_shows during the_1960s , early 1970s , and mid-1980s , but he is_best_known for his_performances in independent_films that later achieved cult_status , particularly Assault on Precinct_13 .
